subject: Re: [junit] About java 1.4
msgSnippet: Can you be more specific?  I have been working on JDK1.4 and the only problem I found was something realted to GUI actions.  The JUnit framework itself has
messageBody:
Can you be more specific? I have been working on JDK1.4 and the only
problem I found was something realted to GUI actions. The JUnit
framework itself has been working well.

wenzhe lu wrote:

>Dear all,
>
>I found the junit3.7 can not work with java1.4 together.
>But it seemed that the junit3.7 is the newest version.
>How can my programes based on 1.4 work with junit now?
>
>thanks
>
>To unsubscribe from this group, send an email to:
>junit-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com
